Leo Genn https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leo_Genn 0 Leopold John "Leo" Genn (9 August 1905 – 26 January 1978) was an English actor and barrister. He is perhaps best known for his role as Petronius in the 1951 film Quo Vadis, which earned him an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor nomination. Leopold_John_"_Leo_"_Genn ( 9_August_1905 – 26_January_1978 ) was an_English_actor_and_barrister . He is_perhaps_best_known for his_role as Petronius in the_1951_film_Quo_Vadis , which earned him an_Academy_Award for Best_Supporting_Actor_nomination .
